item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1225; 06:37PM; 357 S Curson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xzdV7D; #MidWilshire; PRELIM: Trash Dumpster Fire in basement of 13 story #ParkLaBrea residential high-rise, held by fire sprinklers, now out. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E229 E261 E27 E29 E61 RA61 RA68 RA861 T29 T61; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

#GleasonFire - CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0942; 03:46PM; 12301 N Mt Gleason Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JRWIca; #Tujunga; Despite light wind, 73 LAFD personnel responding by ground and air, working alongside ANF responders, took just 32 minutes to stop forward progress of the fire, containing flames to *less than* One-and-One-Half (1.5) acres of medium brush near the Tujunga Little League Field. No injury. No structure damage. No evacuation. The cause of the fire, determined to be in LAFD jurisdiction, is under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC12 BC14 E102 E24 E260 E274 E290 E298 E42 E7 E77 E81 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H5 HA1 HA2 HA5 RA86 T60 T74 T90 T98 WT77 and Angeles National Forest (ANF) 1C1 BC31 ENG10 ENG19 ENG310 ENG312 ENG511 in Automatic Aid; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

No structure threat.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E102 E24 E260 E274 E298 E42 E7 E77 E81 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H5 HA1 HA2 HA5 RA86 T60 T74 T98 WT77 and Angeles National Forest (ANF) 1C1 BC31 ENG10 ENG19 ENG310 ENG312 ENG511; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 04/16/2022 INC#1187

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1187; 06:09PM; 231 E 87th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jM21PI; #BroadwayManchester; It took 89 LAFD Firefighters, in a well coordinated defensive operation, just 51 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish wind-swept fire that heavily involved a split-level apartment building (2 stories in front, 1 story to the rear) in the framing and wrap stage of construction. Firefighters prevented fire spread to nearby (established) residential structure(s). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E203 E21 E210 E215 E233 E264 E295 E33 E46 E5 E57 E65 EA1 EM13 HR3 RA3 RA65 RA864 SQ21 T10 T15 T3 T64 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 04/16/2022 INC#1187

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1187; 05:38PM; 231 E 87th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jM21PI; #BroadwayManchester; *Address Numeric Corrected* to 231. This incident has escalated to Greater Alarm status with 89 LAFD personnel actively assigned in defensive firefighting operations. The 2 story apartment building is further described as a split-level duplex (2 stories in front, 1 story to the rear) in the framing and wrap stage of construction, well involved with fire. Firefighters have prevented any direct fire spread to adjacent structure(s). No injury. No evacuation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E203 E21 E210 E215 E233 E264 E295 E33 E46 E5 E57 E65 EM13 HR3 RA65 RA864 SQ21 T10 T15 T3 T64 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0088; 01:52AM; 150 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JNYlYb; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 mins with no injuries reported.
